    getNextFreePosition(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.FlightBoardImplementation
    getNextFreePosition() increases the current position until there a cell containing no player is found this is because the rules of the game prohibit a cell to contain more than one player and so a player can't be moved to a cell that already contains a player
    getNextPosition(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.FlightBoardImplementation
